question: Which of the following kings ascended the Rashtrakuta throne after Govind IV?
explanation: Amoghavarsha IIIÂ  was the younger brother of Indra III and uncle of Govinda IV. He came to power with the help of feudatory King Arikesari of Vemulavada who revolted against Govinda IV. Amoghavarsha III ruled from 934 A.D. to 939 A.D.
